Polish: The Retired Hero

Polish: Well, you know where he is. Whenever you have the time, seek him out.

Polish: Greetings stranger! My name is Elaine. What brings you all the way up here?

Polish: Elaine lives just West of this location. Please go and find him!

Polish: Find Elaine.

Polish: Forest Destroyers

Polish: Ahh, Reonan is looking to reunite the original 8 heroes you say? He was a dear friend, but I don't think I will be able to fulfill his request. You see… things have changed since that time…

Polish: Alright, I guess I should uphold my end of the promise!
